channel.title: Error adding SystemUpdate [HV 459]
channel.description:
[size=36pt]THIS IS NOT DELTA![/size] Tryin to add system update i got to the command and startin getting error so i thought id finish the tut becuase some times it works.. but nope
Building Hyperion Revision #459... src\org\hyperion\rs2\packet\CommandPacketHandler.java:86: cannot find symbol symbol : variable GameEngine location: class org.hyperion.rs2.packet.CommandPacketHandler GameEngine.setStartedSystemUpdate(true); ^ src\org\hyperion\rs2\packet\CommandPacketHandler.java:88: cannot find symbol symbol : variable GameEngine location: class org.hyperion.rs2.packet.CommandPacketHandler GameEngine.setSystemUpdateTimer(time); ^ src\org\hyperion\rs2\packet\CommandPacketHandler.java:89: cannot find symbol symbol : class SystemUpdateEvent location: class org.hyperion.rs2.packet.CommandPacketHandler World.getWorld().submit(new SystemUpdateEvent()) ; ^ 3 errors Press any key to continue . . .

item.title: Error adding SystemUpdate [HV 459]
item.dc:creator: @Infinity_Zr Infinity Zr
item.description:
@Infinity_Zr wrote:

Ah sorry ive allways bin use to a delta… so could you kinda spoon feed me a little please… i know id have to declare systemupdateevent

But how?

Read full topic

item.title: Error adding SystemUpdate [HV 459]
item.dc:creator: @Infinity_Zr Infinity Zr
item.description:
@Infinity_Zr wrote:

public static void setSystemUpdateTimer(int systemUpdateTimer) { GameEngine.systemUpdateTimer = systemUpdateTimer; } 
public static int getSystemUpdateTimer() {
	return systemUpdateTimer;
}

public static void setStartedSystemUpdate(boolean isStartedSystemUpdate) {
	GameEngine.isStartedSystemUpdate = isStartedSystemUpdate;
}

public static boolean isStartedSystemUpdate() {
	return isStartedSystemUpdate;
}</blockquote>

i guess that declares Systemupdate?

Read full topic
